name: @kroki/mermaid-server
description: A micro server built on top of the Mermaid diagram library.

scripts.prestart: rm -rf assets/mermaid/* && mkdir -p assets/mermaid/chunks/mermaid.esm.min && cp -r node_modules/mermaid/dist/mermaid.esm.min.mjs assets/mermaid/ && cp -r node_modules/mermaid/dist/chunks/mermaid.esm.min/*.mjs assets/mermaid/chunks/mermaid.esm.min/

author: Guillaume Grossetie
